category: National Pension Review Committee Operation Regulations/Article 4 (Chairman)
contents: Article 4 (Chairman) ① The chairman of the National Pension Review Committee (hereinafter referred to as the *Examination Committee) shall be the pension director. Revised December 28, 2016. ② The chairperson represents the review committee and supervises the duties of the review committee. Revised September 16, 2022. ③ When designating members pursuant to Article 92 (1) of the Decree, the Chairperson shall ensure that no specific member is excluded. ④ Delete
